languages.text: {n}Иокаста яростно вскидывает подбородок.{/n} "Может, наши методы не соответствуют высочайшим стандартам Арбитес, но они принесут результат — клянусь честью Мастера дисциплины!"

{n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста яростно вскидывает подбородок.{/n} "Может, наши методы не соответствуют высочайшим стандартам Арбитес, но они принесут результат — клянусь честью Мастера дисциплины!"

{n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克愤怒地扬起了下巴。{/n}“或许我们的手段确实满足不了帝国法务部的最高标准，但我们肯定能到想要的结果！我以戒律大师的名誉发誓！”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克愤怒地扬起了下巴。{/n}“或许我们的手段确实满足不了帝国法务部的最高标准，但我们肯定能到想要的结果！我以戒律大师的名誉发誓！”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback alza la cabeza con furia.{/n} «Nuestros métodos no estarán a la altura de los estándares más exigentes del Adeptus Arbites, pero tendrán los resultados que necesitamos. ¡Lo juro por mi honor como maestra de armas!».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback alza la cabeza con furia.{/n} «Nuestros métodos no estarán a la altura de los estándares más exigentes del Adeptus Arbites, pero tendrán los resultados que necesitamos. ¡Lo juro por mi honor como maestra de armas!».

languages.text: {n}Sauerback relève le menton d'un air outré.{/n} « Nos méthodes ne sont peut-être pas à la hauteur des standards de l'Adeptus Arbites, mais nous obtiendrons les résultats attendus. Je le jure sur mon honneur de capitaine d'armes ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback relève le menton d'un air outré.{/n} « Nos méthodes ne sont peut-être pas à la hauteur des standards de l'Adeptus Arbites, mais nous obtiendrons les résultats attendus. Je le jure sur mon honneur de capitaine d'armes ! »

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは怒って顎を突き上げた。{/n}「私たちのやり方は高等裁定局には及ばないかもしれませんが、必要な成果は必ず手にしてみせます。マスター・アット・アームの誇りにかけて！」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは怒って顎を突き上げた。{/n}「私たちのやり方は高等裁定局には及ばないかもしれませんが、必要な成果は必ず手にしてみせます。マスター・アット・アームの誇りにかけて！」

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, öfkeyle çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Metotlarımız, Adeptus Arbites'in en yüksek standartlarında olmayabilir ama bize ihtiyacımız olan sonuçları verecekler. Buna Silahtar olarak şerefim üzerine yemin ederim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback öfkeyle çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Metotlarımız Adeptus Arbites'in en yüksek standartlarında olmayabilir ama bize ihtiyacımız olan sonuçları verecekler. Buna Silahtar olarak şerefim üzerine yemin ederim!"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback hebt wütend ihr Kinn.{/n} "Unsere Methoden mögen nicht den hohen Standards der Adeptus Arbites entsprechen, aber sie führen zu den gewünschten Resultaten – das schwöre ich bei meiner Ehre als Waffenmeisterin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback furiously jerks up her chin.{/n} "Our methods may not be up to the highest standards of the Adeptus Arbites, but they will get us the results we need — I swear it on my honour as Master-at-Arms!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback hebt wütend ihr Kinn.{/n} "Unsere Methoden mögen nicht den hohen Standards der Adeptus Arbites entsprechen, aber sie führen zu den gewünschten Resultaten – das schwöre ich bei meiner Ehre als Waffenmeisterin!"
